author: coffee-cogs
install_msg: Thanks for installing :') Come make pull requests over at my GitHub! https://github.com/coffeebank/coffee-cogs
name: sendhook
description: Makes sending webhooks from the Discord chat super easy. Just give it a webhook url and a message! Can even save aliases for webhooks you want to send to often.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
